website_summaries.verdict: A powerful cleaner by a top brand that's easy to use and works well for most dirty ovens.
pros: Works in 5 minutes and is easy to use - simply spray, wait, and wipe
Does a good job removing grease
cons: Fumes can be overpowering - proper ventilation helps

customer_reviews.title: Excellent oven cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Best oven cleaning product I've ever used! It had been 6 months since I last cleaned my oven. Last time I tried a home made vinegar paste. It worked well but I didn't like the residual it left in its wake. No residuals with the 409, I went with an overnight soak, outside of a couple very tough spots, it easily wiped clean with a sponge. Have some newspaper or paper towel on hand as you will have a bit of a pond in the bottom of your oven to mop up. I'm using it on the racks as well. I had to dock it one start because you do not want to breathe this stuff in, very irritating!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Klingensmith

customer_reviews.title: Great Oven Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I am a landlord and getting a property ready to rent. The oven was so dirty, I didn't know how we would get this clean. I used this oven cleaner, let it sit for 30 minutes and it wiped clean. I love this cleaner. It has a great scent too.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The smell is awful and back-spray is probably bad for your lungs. Hold your breath, cover your face, spray quick and shut that door. The oven looked so much better after letting it sit for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Not recommend! I had light grease built up, the which this product did not help remove! Easy off did the work!
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Does ok
customer_reviews.text: It works the same way easy off doesn't do the job it should
customer_reviews.author: Ruiz C.

customer_reviews.title: Very Toxic Mist
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed the oven with this product in a well ventilated kitchen. Unfortunately the aerosol mist drifted up into my face. Although I tried to hold my breath to complete the spraying, I was left coughing, gasping for air, and with a very sore throat. Extremely toxic.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K Hamielec

customer_reviews.title: A f'n mess
customer_reviews.text: When I recieved the item the cap had broken & came off in transit. WHAT A MESS!!! Can you either replace or refund
customer_reviews.author: Michael Keller

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: I have a cleaning company and we do a lot of oven cleaning. Best cleaner ever. Works quick. Not much scrubbing Easy on the skin
customer_reviews.author: christina lynch

customer_reviews.title: Content with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The scent is rough but the cleaning power is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Jo

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is the second can I’ve bought. It is the best oven cleaner I’ve ever used and I’ve used a lot! I also use on greasy stove. Got it at Bargain Barn and thought it would be cheap excuse for cleaner but I was very pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Didn't clean at all. Felt like I was spraying on dish soap for all the good it did.
customer_reviews.author: sugarmag

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: It did its job. It may take a little rubbing, but that is your job.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph W. Stewart

product_meta.title: 409 Heavy Duty Spray-On Oven Cleaner | Cuts Through Grease & Grime on Contact | A Powerful Clean You Can Trust, 14.5 oz, Lemon Scent
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Pack

409's lemon-scented Heavy Duty Oven Cleaner cuts through tough baked on food and grease in five minutes.

FIVE MINUTE CLEANING:
Spray in cold oven. Hold can upright, pointed away from face. Liberally spray spots from a distance of 9-12 inches. Allow to stand for 5 minutes. Wipe clean, use a wet sponge, cloth, or paper towels.

TWO HOUR CLEANING:
Spray in cold oven. If you have a self-cleaning oven, make sure self-cleaning cycle is turned off and oven is cold. Hold can away fom face. Spray top of oven first, then spray sides and bottom of oven. Spray over oven surfaces from a distance of 912 inches, making sure that the soiled surfaces are well covered. Close door. Wait 2 hours for foam to penetrate oven soils. Do not turn on oven or self-cleaning cycle. Wipe clean. Use a wet sponge, cloth, or paper towels.

EASY OVERNIGHT CLEANING:
Spray in cold oven. Follow directions above. Close door, allow foam to penetrate overnight. Do not turn on oven. Wipe clean, use a wet sponge, cloth, or paper towels.

Warning: Do not use knife or other tools to pry open cap. Doing so may puncture container. Use in cold oven. Do not spray on pilot light, electrical connections, switches, light bulbs, heating elements, or thermostats. Do not spray onto aluminum or painted surfaces as damage to these surfaces may occur. Do not use in microwave, convection ovens, or continuous-cleaning ovens. Can be used in self-cleaning ovens provided that the self-cleaning cycle is turned off. USE ONLY AS DIRECTED. INTENTIONAL MISUSE BY CONCENTRATING AND INHALING THE PRODUCT CAN BE HARMFUL OR FATAL. Keep out of reach of children. Contains sodium hydroxide. Causes burns to eyes and skin on contact. Harmful if swallowed. Contents under pressure.
feature_bullets: TOUGH ON GREASE — Heavy duty oven cleaner cuts through tough backed on food and grease

CLEANS IN 5 MINUTES — Spray in cold oven. Hold can upright, pointed away from face. Liberally spray spots from a distance of 9-12 inches. Allow to stand for 5 minutes. Wipe clean, use a wet sponge, cloth, or paper towels
CAN ALSO BE USED FOR 2 HOUR CLEANING — Oven, grill, and stove top cleaner can also be used for a 2 hour cleaning or even deeper overnight clean. See description for directions
FRESH LEMON SCENT — Leaves behind a fresh lemon scent
TRUSTED BRAND — Trusted brand in quick and efficient “de-grease” cleaning
